Key to the families of Dicotyledons
Key to the genera of Ericaceae

leads.lead_text: Corolla wholly red or greenish at very base of tube; inner surface of corolla tube with tufts or a ring of hairs or with densely pubescent ridge-like outgrowths towards the base; leaves usually broader than narrow-linear, with several veins visible on lower surface

Corolla tube yellow for greater part (sometimes reddish at base and green towards apex), lobes green; inner surface of corolla with scattered hairs, lacking tufts or a ring of hairs or densely pubescent ridge-like outgrowths towards base; leaves narrow-linear, with usually only the midvein visible on the lower surface
